name: Winterblood
description:
Hello!

I need some feedback on this,  ist the main reason why I put this project here.

Some day i want to make something bigger out of this.

This is a prototype of my top down shooter. You can use barrels and boxes as a covers, just hold shift. When obsticle becomes a cover changes colour to slightly darker. 

Also while crouching enemies cant see you. 

Controlls:

WSAD walk

Shift crouch

R reload

QE 1,2,3 different weapons

Left mouse Shooting

L turn on Light (for better fps)
